Guest Facilities at the Days Inn Sedgemoor Hotel:
Continental breakfast is served at the Days Inn Sedgemoor Hotel from £4.95 per person. A selection of hot breakfasts are also available.
Car Parking Facilities: An car park is available to guests staying at the Days Inn Sedgemoor Hotel. Parking is on a complimentary basis for hotel residents.
Internet access: Wireless internet access is available in all guest rooms at the Days Inn Sedgemoor Hotel and is charged at £10 per 24 hours.
Welcome Break Sedgemoor Services:
• Coffee Primo: Often described as “quality coffee on the go”, Coffee Primo offers a fine range of Italian coffee, a selection of sandwiches and wraps, muffins and cakes. The comfortable leather couches, the highly trained staff and the relaxed environment make Coffee Primo a popular place to relax and enjoy a snack.
• Eat IN: A modern contemporary restaurant serving breakfast, lunch and evening meals with a great range of hot food and snacks.
• Burger King: a popular fast food restaurant.
• Retail Shop: A convenient shop selling a range of snacks, drinks and a selection of essential health and beauty products. • Gamezone: Play your Nintendo DS wirelessly online for free at the Days Inn Sedgemoor
• BT Openzone: A fast convenient service providing easy to use wireless broadband internet access at reasonable rates. You can choose between a one-hour voucher or a monthly subscription.
